title: PSX Geopolitics And Internal Security Concerns Mar Performance - OpEd
desc: Pakistan Stock Exchange (PXS) trended upwards for most of the week before adjusting by 3,703 points on Friday’s session, wiping out earlier gains to close the benchmark index at 184,130pts, down 45 points or 0.02%WoW. The decline was triggered by escalating geopolitical tensions over US and Iran, alongside adverse domestic security developments. Earlier in the...

title: Hock Kin urges BAM to fix programme that has failed to produce next Chong Wei

title: Foreign Office to review Mandelson's US ambassador pay-off
desc: A pay-off given to Lord Mandelson after he was sacked as ambassador to the US is being reviewed, Foreign Office sources tell the BBC.

title: Men’s snowboard big air: Weeks after arm break, Ollie Martin narrowly misses out on podium
desc: American teen Ollie Martin finishes fourth in his Olympic debut as Kira Kimura wins the men's snowboard big air gold.

title: Tinubu to embark on two-day UK state visit - first by a Nigerian president in 37 years
desc: President Bola Tinubu is set to commence a two-day state visit in the United Kingdom on March 18, Buckingham Palace has announced.

title: Broadcom’s Wi‑Fi 8 Launch And Hyperscaler AI Builds Might Change The Case For Investing In AVGO
desc: In early February 2026, Broadcom announced the industry’s first enterprise Wi‑Fi 8 access point and switch platform, built on its new BCM49438 accelerated processing unit and Trident X3+ BCM56390 Ethernet switch to support AI-ready, multi-gigabit enterprise networks with unified security and analytics. The launch, combined with very large AI infrastructure spending plans from hyperscalers such as Alphabet and Amazon, underscores Broadcom’s role at the center of both custom AI accelerators...

title: One AI hub, fewer tabs - 1min.AI’s lifetime plan costs $99.99
desc: The 1min.AI Advanced Business Plan lifetime subscription is available for $99.99, delivering 81% off AI tools for writing, images, PDFs, audio, and video.

title: Dozens of flood warnings in England after days of non-stop rain
desc: Rain has fallen in south-west England and south Wales every day of 2026 so far, the Met Office said.

title: 'One Battle After Another' Wins at British Society of Cinematographers
desc: "One Battle After Another's" Michael Bauman has won the British Society of Cinematographers Feature Film Award.
